desc: Deletes the last printed character via the 3rd and 4th variants of [print()](print.md), and it updates the cursor position.

args.name: c
args.desc: The background color to fill the character with (**-1**,**15**), **-1** means no background, defaults to the current print cursor background color.

usage.name: Delete the last character without doing a carriage return if needed:

args.name: c
args.desc: The background color to fill the character with (**-1**,**15**), **-1** means no background, defaults to the current print cursor background color.
